results.name: Sum of all the digits of n in every base from 2 to n-1.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..10000
mathematica: Table[Plus @@ Flatten[Table[IntegerDigits[n, b], {b, 2, n - 1}]], {n, 3, 36}] (* _Alonso del Arte_, Mar 28 2009 *)
results.author: _Olivier Gérard_
